name: The Sentinel (itch) (mathchai)
description:
You are the last ancient guardian tree that will have to fight monsters to protect the ancient forest, use your roots to find power and use power to protect. 

How to play ?

- use arrows to slide screen up and down use W A S D to move your roots every night you can move 10 times so try to get many mineral to grow up be a strong tree! 

(this is my first game jam project with a awesome team as a gamedesigner and programer i got a lot problem during do this project i almost die to finish it! lol so hope you enjoy my little game!)
